bucketName.description: S3 bucket name for storing logs (required for S3 type)

prefix.description: S3 key prefix for organizing logs

region.description: AWS region for the S3 bucket (required for S3 type)

enableServerSideEncryption.description: Enable server-side encryption for S3 objects

storageClass.description: S3 storage class for log objects

expirationDays.description: Number of days after which logs are automatically deleted (0 means no expiration)

maxConcurrentStreams.description: Maximum number of concurrent log streams allowed

streamTimeoutMinutes.description: Timeout in minutes for idle log streams before automatic cleanup

asyncBufferSizeMB.description: Size of async buffer in MB for batching log writes
